The centers of the disks are aligned, as shown in the figure. Disk <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>2</mn></math> is dropped onto the Disk <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>1</mn></math>, and after a short time they rotate counterclockwise with the same angular speed <math alttext="omega sub f" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>.
